desc: CVPRO provides professional CV services including Curriculum Vitae, LinkedIn Profiles, and cover letters specifically for the New Zealand and Australian employment markets. Over 10 years in business and 2,000 CVs written, please see our testimonials.

layout.text: Hi, We are currently working on a full time contract and are taking longer to fulfill orders, if you are prepared to wait six working days I am happy to discount my fee by 20%.  I am still offering a no obligation free CV review service, just email your CV to info@cvpro.co.nz.

We have experience writing CVs for clients at all career stages and levels. We’ll work with you to construct a compelling New Zealand CV that effectively showcases your unique offering. Please note we write CVs using a concise professional layout, we do not write Portfolio style CVs.
